title: Inna discography
summary: Romanian singer Inna has released seven studio albums, three compilations, 58 singles (including 15 as featured artist) and 46 promotional singles. Her YouTube channel surpassed three billion total views as of May 2019.[1] 22 of her singles have reached the top ten in Romania, with "Hot", "Amazing", "Diggy Down" and "Bebe" topping the country's singles chart in 2008, 2009, 2015 and 2020, respectively. With global album sales of four million copies from her first three studio albums, Inna is the best-selling Romanian artist.[2][3]
